reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress looks cute, well-made, and comfortable, with soft corduroy fabric and accurate color representation. The dress receives positive feedback for its material quality, with one customer noting it's regular corduroy. Customers disagree on the sizing, with some finding it true to size while others say it runs small. The fit receives mixed reviews, with some finding it perfect while others note the sleeves are too short. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect!
items.body: I love this dress! It fits perfectly. For reference, I’m 5’4” and 175-180lbs, small D in the chest. I bought a Large. It has pockets and the corduroy is soft and true to color. Love! Read more
items.author: David Ewing

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super comfy
items.body: Im 5’3 curvy about 175lbs I got a size Large and I feel super cute wearing this! I get so may compliments everytime, it’s not heavy but it keeps me warm. I love pairing it with knee high boots or doc martens Read more
items.author: MarkLupeFulcher

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great cold weather staple dress! Size up or cami for D cups and up
items.body: Super comfortable, soft semi- wide wale corduroy dress, LOVE the pockets. Feels well made, sturdy and looks well sewn for a change. Material does not stretch or give, functional front button closure. Haven’t washed yet, so can’t speak regarding how it will hold up to laundering, but my general rule for these types of clothes is cold gentle/hand wash setting on the machine, hang to drip dry or dry flat, or even do Dryel if it’s super delicate. This isn’t, so I digress. That may not work for everyone but I’ve gotten tons more mileage out of my “fast fashion” cheapish Amazon clothes by babying them a little. I’m 5’3.5” tall, 162 lbs, 38DDD. Ordered a Large. this hits perfectly at my knees. This will look good with tights and boots, flats, easy to style. Can do a belt if you don’t mind a belt over the center buttons. Love the fact that it is slightly shaped so it doesn’t hang like a sack BUT- PLEASE BE WARNED- if you have anything bigger than a C cup, you will not be able to button across your chest without either sizing up (which will impact the neat semi fitted look) or being prepared to wear a cami underneath , as you will have that awful pulling/ gapping across your boobs, which is up there with camel toe, VPL and the like lol. I have to do a cami with the size L on DDD cups, as an XL would have added too much bulk overall just to get the upper buttons without gapping. Left off one star for the lack of room for bigger chests, that’s really the only fault I found! Well worth a shot if you keep that in mind for fit. Read more
items.author: "L"

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Corduroy Dress
items.body: The quality of this dress is outstanding! It fits perfectly. I read the reviews and followed their sizing recommendations. I am 5'3 - 135 1b and the Medium is a perfect fit. The Material is good quality and will be a great addition to my wardrobe throughout the fall and winter seasons. Read more
items.author: B. L. Smith

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice fabric & fit except…
items.body: I bought an XXL & the fit was fine. I agree with other reviewers that the fabric is very nice. My problem was that the sleeves have a puff or lift at the shoulders. That, coupled with the placement of the pockets, I looked like a linebacker. It is probably cute on someone very petite and thin. I’m short but not thin. I had to return it. Read more
items.author: K. S.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I really like this dress!
items.body: This is a really cute, comfortable dress. It has some stretch to it, which I love. My only issue is that the button holes are a tad small, but that's better than them being loose and it coming unbuttoned. It does seem to fit a little bit small, so if you tend to hover between two sizes, consider sizing up, especially if you have an ample chest. Read more
items.author: Lisa R Smith

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars LOVE THIS DRESS!
items.body: ORDERED TO WEAR FOR FALL. DOES RUN A TAD SMALL. I'M A 4-6 ORDERED A SMALL. FITS TO A TEE BUT IF I WERE TO GAIN 5 LBS OR ACCIDENTALLY SHRINK IT....WOULD DEFINATELY NEED A MEDIUM. OTHERWISE LOVE IT FOR THE PRICE!!! Read more
items.author: SJS

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not true to size
items.body: This was not true to size. Couldn’t wear as a dress because the buttons pull Read more
items.author: Kate

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Red, Brown, White, Blue, Apricot, Black, Coffee, Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
